title: ARMADA Acquires Poseidon Industrial LLC, Expanding Its Solutions Offering to the U.S. Navy and Defense Support Capabilities
summary: SPANISH FORT, Ala.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ARMADA Parent Inc., a leading solutions provider for outsourced U.S. Navy ship repair and construction, today announced the acquisition of Poseidon Industrial LLC (Poseidon). Poseidon is a Virginia based company supporting the U.S. Navy and defense industry with mechanical, electrical, and systems integration services for modernization and repair projects.
